tool_description: Combines rooms, tasks, and frequency patterns to create comprehensive cleaning schedule templates.

room_ids.description: List of room identifiers to include

task_ids.description: List of task identifiers to include

auto_distribute.description: Whether to automatically balance task distribution

error_messages: Invalid room_ids: One or more room IDs do not exist
Invalid task_ids: One or more task IDs do not exist
Invalid pattern_id: Pattern ID does not exist
Invalid start_date: Must be a valid future date in ISO format
Invalid duration_weeks: Must be between 1 and 52
Incompatible tasks and rooms: Some tasks cannot be applied to selected rooms
usage: Combine previously created rooms, tasks, and patterns into a working schedule template. This creates the foundation that can be further customized.

coverage_summary.description: Description of what the template covers
